flawed_nl_solution:
Angela has 8 more marbles than Allison who has 28 so Angela has 8+28 = <<8+28=33>>33 marbles
Albert has three times as many marbles as Angela who has 33 so Albert has 3*33 = <<3*33=99>>99 marbles
Albert and Allison together have 99+28 = <<99+28=127>>127 marbles
#### 127

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 33. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
